explanation: [0-0] At a live football match, there are a large number of spectators in the stands, some text on the fence at the edge of the pitch, a white goal on the pitch, a goalkeeper in a red jersey standing in front of the goal, and the players on the pitch are divided into two teams, one wearing yellow and black jerseys and the other wearing white jerseys. The player in the yellow jersey with the number 13 has a football in front of him.

[0-7] First, the player in the yellow jersey with the number 13 runs to the ball and pretends to shoot without actually kicking the ball, then runs directly to the right, two players from the white team follow him to defend, and then withdraw after finding that the player in the yellow jersey with the number 13 did not take the ball, after which the player in the yellow jersey with the number 13 also walks back, he suddenly starts running to the ball, takes a long shot, three players from the yellow team on the left run to receive the ball, the player in the middle shoots the ball with his head, the goalkeeper in the red jersey dives to save the ball, but it is too late, the ball goes in.
